Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 6 -- 11.31 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Claiborne Parish Fire Protection District No. 6 of the Parish of Claiborne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of eleven and thirty-one hundredths (11.31) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $485,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, for purchasing and acquiring fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment and facilities and for paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and services?
